summary: This New York Post article discusses Ghislaine Maxwell's declining social status due to negative press surrounding her relationship with Prince Andrew. It highlights her connections to Jeffrey Epstein and the mystery surrounding her financial situation following her father's controversial death.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is portrayed as a socialite facing backlash from her peers due to her relationship with Prince Andrew and negative press coverage.

persons.name: Robert Maxwell
persons.context: Robert Maxwell is mentioned as Ghislaine's father, whose financial misdeeds have cast a shadow over her own wealth.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Prince Andrew is referenced as Ghislaine's friend with whom she attended a themed party, contributing to her negative press.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a financier who has a retainer agreement with Ghislaine Maxwell and is known for his connections with young women.

persons.name: Brooke de Ocampo
persons.context: Brooke de Ocampo is mentioned as the author of a book that has negatively portrayed Ghislaine's social circle.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew are friends who attended a themed party together.
Ghislaine Maxwell is said to be on retainer from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a financial relationship.
Ghislaine is the daughter of Robert Maxwell, whose financial troubles have impacted her reputation.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is experiencing social backlash due to her relationship with Prince Andrew.
Robert Maxwell's financial misdeeds have affected Ghislaine's reputation and wealth.
Ghislaine is reportedly on retainer from Jeffrey Epstein, who is known for his connections with young women.
Brooke de Ocampo's book has negatively portrayed Ghislaine's social circle.
Ghislaine's financial situation is described as mysterious, with implications of ill-gotten gains.
